name: vindaloo
content:

a spicy South Asian dish that consists of meat, fish, or vegetables in a sauce made with garlic and spices: I've only ever had a vindaloo once - it was much too hot for me. His favourite dish on the menu is chicken vindaloo with basmati rice. The milder kormas of Northern India contrast with the spicy vindaloos of the south.
